message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product at a price of $11,500.  I believe this is a fair offer considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to make a serious investment in this product, but I need to be comfortable with the price.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $9,500 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,750?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,750 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,200. Can we meet at that price?
